Package socialmedia

Class Comment

java.lang.Object
socialmedia.Post
socialmedia.Comment
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Comment
extends Post
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Comment​(java.lang.String message, Account author, java.lang.Integer postPointer, java.lang.Integer pid)
    Creates a comment Sets the arraylist of comments and endorsements to empty, since a comment can only be commented on or endorsed after creation

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addComment​(Comment comment)
    Adds a comment to the arraylist of comments in a comment
    void addEndorsement​(Endorsement endorsement)
    Adds an endorsement to the arraylist of endorsements to a comment
    java.util.ArrayList<Comment> getComments()
    Gets arraylist of comments
    java.util.ArrayList<Endorsement> getEndorsements()
    Gets arraylist of endorsements
    java.lang.Integer getPostPointer()
    Gets post pointer
    void setPostPointer​(java.lang.Integer postPointer)
    Sets post pointer of the comment Used only when the parent comment is deleted and the post pointer now refers to the generic deleted message

    Methods inherited from class socialmedia.Post

    getAuthor, getMessage, getPid

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Comment

      public Comment​(java.lang.String message, Account author, java.lang.Integer postPointer, java.lang.Integer pid)
      Creates a comment Sets the arraylist of comments and endorsements to empty, since a comment can only be commented on or endorsed after creation
      Parameters:
      message - message of the comment
      author - author of the comment
      postPointer - post ID of the parent post
      pid - post ID of the comment

  • Method Details

    • getPostPointer

      public java.lang.Integer getPostPointer()
      Gets post pointer
      Returns:
      post pointer of the comment

    • getEndorsements

      public java.util.ArrayList<Endorsement> getEndorsements()
      Gets arraylist of endorsements
      Returns:
      arraylist of endorsements that endorsed a comment

    • getComments

      public java.util.ArrayList<Comment> getComments()
      Gets arraylist of comments
      Returns:
      arraylist of comments that commented on a comment

    • addEndorsement

      public void addEndorsement​(Endorsement endorsement)
      Adds an endorsement to the arraylist of endorsements to a comment
      Parameters:
      endorsement - endorsement to be added to the arraylist of endorsements

    • addComment

      public void addComment​(Comment comment)
      Adds a comment to the arraylist of comments in a comment
      Parameters:
      comment - comment to be added to the arraylist of endorsements

    • setPostPointer

      public void setPostPointer​(java.lang.Integer postPointer)
      Sets post pointer of the comment Used only when the parent comment is deleted and the post pointer now refers to the generic deleted message
      Parameters:
      postPointer - new postpointer that the comment will now contain
